DoublyLinkedList - Class in mainPackage
The DoublyLinkedList class contains the doubly linked list of topics Contains DNode class for the nodes in the linked list Contains methods to add and remove nodes from beggining, end, and at a certain index Methods that returns length of the linked list Methods useful for browsing, inserting, removing, and modifying topics mainly used in the driver class
DoublyLinkedList() - Constructor for class mainPackage.DoublyLinkedList
Default constructor for the DoublyLinkedList
Driver - Class in mainPackage
The Driver class contains the main method and handles user input to perform
Driver() - Constructor for class mainPackage.Driver

SinglyLinkedList - Class in mainPackage
The SinglyLinkedList class contains the singly linked list of words Contains SNode class for the nodes in the linked list Contains methods to add and remove nodes from beggining, end, and at a certain index Methods that returns length of the linked list, checks if a word is in the linked list and at what index Prints the linked list on the terminal or on a file
SinglyLinkedList() - Constructor for class mainPackage.SinglyLinkedList
 
size() - Method in class mainPackage.DoublyLinkedList
Method to return the size of the linked list
size() - Method in class mainPackage.SinglyLinkedList
Returns the length of the linked list

V

Vocab - Class in mainPackage
The Vocab class contains the topic and words of the vocabulary Also contains methods to add, remove, and change words in the vocabulary
Vocab() - Constructor for class mainPackage.Vocab
Default constructor Initializes the topic and words to null
Vocab(String, SinglyLinkedList) - Constructor for class mainPackage.Vocab
Parameterized constructor Initializes the topic and words to the given values
